segments.text: I ’ m taking BA fright 123 to London . Can you tell me where the reporting desk is , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Madam . The reporting desk for the British Airway's flight to London is over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you so much . Is this the desk for BA flight 123 to London ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , this is the right desk . Have you any luggage ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The suitcase , that ’ s all . Except my handbag . Of course .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you please put you suitcase on the scales ? You needn ’ t weigh your handbag .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I ’ ll attach your baggage receipt to your ticket .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You must go to immigration to the departure lounge .
segments.speaker: S2
